Class XmlWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.model.io.xml.XmlWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
XmlSubscriptionWriter
public abstract class XmlWriter
extends Object

Allows writing data to a XML file to the file system.

cleanUp

protected void cleanUp()
                throws SAXException,
                       IOException
Shuts down used resources and frees up memory.

Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems closing the output XML file.
IOException - If the output streams cannot be closed.

                         throws IOException,
                                SAXException
Initializes the system so that the specified output file can be generated.

Parameters:
outputFile - The file to output the specified data to.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing an output XML file.
IOException - If the output file cannot be opened to write.
